This game is a highly tactical shooter, which does mean some people have third party programs for aim assist and to look through walls, but overall a great game.

I would not recommend this game to anybody anymore nowadays. IT IS FULL OF HACKERS AND VALVE DOES N-O-T-H-I-N-G ABOUT THIS MATTER. It is a frustrating experience and an absolute waste of time. Definitely not for people that value their time and want to relax and enjoy a game experience. This game is an absolute nightmare.

Great game. Mechanics work well unlike most games.

Mira te explico, este juego de re mierda, donde te meten tiros a la cabeza desde la otra punta del mapa, donde te picanean, donde te fakean los hijos de re mil put*, Donde le metes escopetazos a la cabeza a tu amigo, Donde te puteas con los brazucas, Este mismo juego que hizo que rompiera todo mi escritorio como 20 veces, Donde le rompes el orto a tu amigos, Es un juego de re mierd*. Pero me dio buenos momentos así que lo recomiendo <3

I feel that there is far too much striking in this game and not enough counter. I would have called this game "strike". As such I believe the title is misleading. Thanks for reading.

这游戏非常好玩，强烈推荐

Gotta grind trust factor to even be playable but i played before it became free and had the loyalty badge. Don't even try wingman with low trust factor and comp is pretty bad as well. Just stick to casual and try to harness your skills for the sh?t storm ahead.

This is worth getting for the surf gamemode alone.

Honestly I didn't play the core competitive matchmaking gamemode very much, mostly just arms race, deathmatch, and surf.

Yet, look at my hours played, I think I got my money's worth out of it.
This game is very fun and addictive. Would recommend
